subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ron Blomberg, whose claim to fame is that he was the major leagues’ first designated hitter in 1973, will manage the Bet Shemesh Blue Sox in the inaugural season of the Israel Baseball League.
snippet: Ron Blomberg, whose claim to fame is that he was the major leagues’ first designated hitter in 1973, will manage the Bet Shemesh Blue Sox in the inaugural season of the Israel Baseball League.
